content: pattern requires 14oz red 14oz blue and 1 skein black 2 skeins each of bright red and bright blue and 1 skein of black will make an afghan of 52 or larger to make afghan larger simply keep crocheting until it is the size you want for a knit version of this pattern designed by a wonderful lady named anne see this pattern listing 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spiderman-blanket
